tasks.task: Inglore riding a tractor and working on a farm
subtasks: Sit on the tractor seat
Wear safety gear including helmet and protective gloves
Operate the tractor's controls to drive the vehicle
Adjust the implements attached to the tractor for tillage or planting
Check the condition of the tires and hydraulic systems
Fill the fuel tank and check oil levels
Monitor the progress and make necessary adjustments during operation

tasks.task: Unloading water into a trough using a water cart
subtasks: Approach the water cart carefully
Attach the water cart to the tractor's drawbar
Operate the hydraulic system to lift or tilt the cart
Drive the tractor to the area where water is needed
Release the cart and ensure it is safely placed
Connect the water to the trough using hoses or pipes
Verify that water flows freely into the trough

tasks.task: Driving a tractor to transport goods on the farm
subtasks: Start the tractor engine
Shift gears appropriately for speed and load
Maneuver the tractor to load goods onto the back
Secure the load to prevent shifting during transit
Drive the tractor to the destination, maintaining control and safety
Unload the goods at the destination and ensure they are placed safely
Return the tractor to its original position or the barn

tasks.task: Attaching and detaching a plowing implement to a tractor
subtasks: Check if the implement is properly hitched to the tractor
Lower the plowing implement slowly to the ground
Ensure the plow is level and functioning correctly
Detach the implement by raising it off the ground
Secure the implement in the designated storage area
Prepare the tractor for the next task by cleaning and lubricating

tasks.task: Planting crops using a seed drill
subtasks: Position the tractor and seed drill accurately in the field
Adjust the depth and spacing settings of the seed drill
Operate the seed drill to plant seeds in rows
Monitor the planting speed and ensure consistent seeding depth

tasks.task: Checking the condition of crops in the field
subtasks: Walk through the field to observe the growth and health of the crops
Identify any signs of pest damage or nutrient deficiencies
Look for weeds and decide on management strategies
Note any areas needing extra watering or fertilization

tasks.task: Driving a tractor to move soil using a front loader
subtasks: Attach the front loader to the tractor
Perform a test lift to ensure the loader is secure
Drive the tractor to the area where soil needs to be moved
Use the loader to scoop soil into the desired location
Position the soil accurately and spread it as needed
Drive back to the original location and repeat if necessary

tasks.task: Applying fertilizer to crops using a sprayer
subtasks: Connect the sprayer to the tractor's hydraulic system
Check the calibration of the sprayer to spread the correct amount
Operate the sprayer while driving through the field
Monitor the spray pattern and adjust as needed
Record the area treated to ensure all sections are covered

tasks.task: Cutting hay using a combine harvester
subtasks: Attach the combine harvester to the tractor
Adjust the height and positioning of the cutter-bar
Drive the tractor through the hay field, operating the combine
Check the amount and quality of hay being stored
Remove any debris or faulty hay from the storage

tasks.task: Feeding animals at the farm
subtasks: Approach the trough containing animal feed
Monitor the amount of feed left and refill as necessary
Observe the animals for any sign of illness or lack of interest in the feed
Distribute feed evenly across the troughs to avoid waste
Clean spilled feed from the area to prevent molding and attract pests

tasks.task: Sterilizing water troughs
subtasks: Locate the water troughs that need cleaning
Remove any visible debris or waste from the trough
Use a cleaning solution to wash the interior of the trough
Rinse thoroughly with clean water
Add fresh water to the trough for the animals
Check the water level and ensure access to clean water for the animals

tasks.task: Pumping water using a generator
subtasks: Start the generator to provide power for the water pump
Operate the water pump to draw water from the well or reservoir
Check for leaks and that the water flow is adequate
Monitor the generator's fuel levels and replenish as needed during operation

tasks.task: Inglore riding a tractor and working on a farm**
Unloading water into a trough using a water cart**
Driving a tractor to transport goods on the farm**
